project_plan.name: Simple Text-Based Game in Python
project_plan.description: Implement a simple text-based game where players can navigate through different rooms, pick up items, view inventory, and face simple challenges.

task.name: Design the game structure including rooms and navigation.
Implement the player class with attributes for inventory and methods for picking up items and viewing inventory.
Develop the room class that defines different rooms with items and challenges.
Create logic for navigating between rooms.
Implement the challenge system, including random events or encounters in rooms.
Write tests for each of the features above in the corresponding files.
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure that they function correctly.
